description: Enumerate distinct spectra for Cayley graphs of finite abelian groups (e.g., Z_18).
knowledge_seeds: For an abelian group G, eigenvalues of Cayley graph Cay(G,S) are lambda_chi = sum_{s in S} chi(s) for each irreducible character chi.
For cyclic Z_n, characters are chi_k(x) = exp(2*pi*i*k*x/n).
Undirected Cayley graphs require S = S^{-1}, which yields real eigenvalues (complex conjugate pairs sum to reals).
